players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and she is Mafia. We must vote her out today."
You: "Diana is lying. I investigated her last night and she is Mafia. She's trying to frame me to save herself."
Charlie: "Bob's death suggests that one of the mafia members was active last night, and we need to figure out who it is."
Diana: "Alice is lying. I am the detective and she is Mafia. Charlie, you must trust me and vote for Alice."
You: "Diana is clearly the Mafia trying to frame me. Charlie, think about it - if I were Mafia, why would I kill Bob and leave two people who could vote me out? Diana's story doesn't add up."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Alice
